original_text: Then I saw in the right hand of him who was seated on the throne a scroll written within and on the back, sealed with seven seals.
korean_text: 내가 보매 보좌에 앉으신 이의 오른손에 두루마리가 있으니 안팎으로 썼고 일곱 인으로 봉하였더라

sentences.original_text: in the right hand of him who was seated on the throne
a scroll written within and on the back
